description: A merger of two Middle English verbs:

verbs.description: beleave (third-person singular simple present beleaves, present participle beleaving, simple past and past participle beleft)

examples: Synonyms: desert, forsake; see also Thesaurus:abandon

entries.meaning: (obsolete, intransitive) To be left; to remain.
examples: Synonyms: continue, stay; see also Thesaurus:remain
